title: Faf de Klerk: The scrum half who became the beating heart of the Springboks
text:
With the first half that Japan had dominated drawing to a close, the Brave Blossoms had one last opportunity to land a telling blow on South Africa in their quarter-final match with a lineout on the halfway line. Michael Leitch secured possession and Japan quickly worked the ball into the hands of their magician, Timothy Lafaele.

Yet before the centre could reach into his top hat, he had been enveloped by Faf de Klerk who, reading the play perfectly, had come screaming out of the line.
